page.title: 03DOGGETTS FARM (contd)
page.content: old tools and machinery,bottles and other articles which Mr. Squiers hopes to restore and have displayed in the future.The Old Barn which was well known in the area was destroyed by fire in 1984.It was replaced by a large modern barn and workshop.Parts of the old barn are still to be seen inside the new building.A large number of modern machines are used such as combine harvester,tractors,spraying machines. The farm produces mainly bread-making wheat and rape seed from which is obtained chip oil for frying. Smaller crops of borage and coriander are also being grown.A small amount of livestock is also kept including cattle and pigs. Although the farm is profitable this has become harder to achieve in recent years.
